Example.Title: Horizontal
Example.Description: Horizontal WrapPanel with children automatically aligned
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:rubik="https://github.com/huangjia2107/Rubik/"> <rubik:AlignWrapPanel Margin="50,0"> <Button Content="1" Height="30" Width="120" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="2" Height="30" Width="180" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="3" Height="30" Width="200" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="4" Height="30" Width="150" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="5" Height="30" Width="150" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="6" Height="30" Width="100" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="7" Height="30" Width="80" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="8" Height="30" Width="100" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> </rubik:AlignWrapPanel> </Grid>

Example.Title: Vertical
Example.Description: Vertical WrapPanel with children automatically aligned
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:rubik="https://github.com/huangjia2107/Rubik/"> <rubik:AlignWrapPanel Margin="50,0" Orientation="Vertical" Height="120"> <Button Content="1" Height="30" Width="120" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="2" Height="30" Width="180" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="3" Height="30" Width="200" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="4" Height="30" Width="150" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="5" Height="30" Width="150" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="6" Height="30" Width="100" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="7" Height="30" Width="80" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Content="8" Height="30" Width="100" Margin="0,0,20,5" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> </rubik:AlignWrapPanel> </Grid>
